sourcesContent:
import { Fragment, useState } from 'react' import { Dialog, Disclosure, Popover, Transition } from '@headlessui/react' import { ArrowPathIcon, Bars3Icon, ChartPieIcon, CursorArrowRaysIcon, FingerPrintIcon, SquaresPlusIcon, XMarkIcon, } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline' import { ChevronDownIcon, TvIcon, TicketIcon } from '@heroicons/react/20/solid' import smolLogo from '../assets/logos/small_wc_logo.png' const events = [ { name: 'Upcoming', href: '#', icon: ChartPieIcon }, { name: 'Past', href: '#', icon: CursorArrowRaysIcon } ] const callsToAction = [ { name: 'Buy Tickets', href: 'https://www.threepillarpromotions.com/event-details/warriors-cup-51-road-to-one', icon: TicketIcon }, { name: 'View Online', href: 'https://bxngtv.com/', icon: TvIcon }, ] const athletes = [ { name: 'Ranked', href: '#', icon: CursorArrowRaysIcon }, { name: 'All Athletes', href: '#', icon: ChartPieIcon } ] function classNames(...classes) { return classes.filter(Boolean).join(' ') } export default function Header() { const [mobileMenuOpen, setMobileMenuOpen] = useState(false) return (
Events
{events.map((item) => (
{item.name}

{item.description}

))}
{callsToAction.map((item) => ( {item.name} ))}
Athletes
{athletes.map((item) => (
{item.name}

{item.description}

))}
Warrior's Cup
Connect
Log in →
Your Company
{({ open }) => ( <> Product {[...events, ...callsToAction].map((item) => ( {item.name} ))} )} Features Marketplace Company
Log in
) }
